descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/5668/nocturnall.png[/img][/center]

[center][img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/8798/descriptiont.png[/img][/center]
[center]Hi all) At last finished the work which has long been putting off (procrastination hahaha). 
This texture pack of three options robe, choose the one you like. 
I haven\'t talked to the authors of body meshes, therefore the set includes only high res texture.[/center]

[center][list][b]Includes:[/b]
[*]black varint (4096x4096)
[*]leopard variant (4096x4096)
[*]gold chain variant (4096x4096)
[/list][/center]


[center][img]http://img638.imageshack.us/img638/7771/installation.png[/img][/center]
[center][list]
[*]Extract the files
[*]Move the Data folder to your Skyrim folder (Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim)
[*]Enjoy (or maybe not)))
[/list]
Also you may need the console codes, if you want to install the retex as the robe of archmage:
[list]
[*]Archmage robe (no hood) 7C932
[*]Archmage robe (with hood) 10f570
[/list]
Or you need to install [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=820]Non-playable armor[/url][/center]


[center][img]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/3294/uninstallation.png[/img][/center]
[center][b]Remove the following folder:[/b]
Data\\textures\\clothes\\nocturnal\\...[/center]


[center][img]http://img851.imageshack.us/img851/6706/compev.png[/img][/center]
[center]Mod is fully compatible with vanilla bodies)))) 
Now seriously, i\'m tested this retex with CBBE v2 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4043]CBBE v2 Armor and Clothing Replacers[/url] and with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2676]this[/url]. 
Mehes UNP not suitable as are made for a shortened version of the robe, but you can put the UNP body 
to your data and install mesh CBBE for Nocturnal (looks not so impressive but quite satisfactory).[/center]
 


[center][img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/4903/creditst.png[/img][/center]
[center]Please ask me before using a mod for their own purposes.

Much thanks to Bethesda!

I hope you like my mod. Upload yuor pictures, will be glad to see them))
[color=Steelblue][size=3]...Thanks for your attention and supporting!..[/size][/color][/center]
author: mrLenski
